titleStmt.title: The A, B, C, of armes, or, An introduction directorie whereby the order of militarie exercises may easily bee vnderstood, and readily practised, where, when, and howsoeuer occasion is offered / by I.T. ...
titleStmt.author: I. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby, for Iohn Helmes, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstane Church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
